languages.text: "Из-за моего кузена Махария". {n}Между ее бровями появляется яростная складка.{/n} "Я его терпеть не могу, впрочем, это взаимно. Мы едва ли можем находиться в одной комнате, потому при первой возможности я стала вашим блюстителем. Стоит поблагодарить несносного родственника за лучшее решение в моей жизни — я всецело служу вам и не желаю другой судьбы".

"Because of my cousin Macharius." {n}A furious crease appears between her brows.{/n} "I cannot stand him, but the feeling is mutual. We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."
languages.original_text: "Из-за моего кузена Махария". {n}Между ее бровями появляется яростная складка.{/n} "Я его терпеть не могу, впрочем, это взаимно. Мы едва ли можем находиться в одной комнате, потому при первой возможности я стала вашим блюстителем. Стоит поблагодарить несносного родственника за лучшее решение в моей жизни — я всецело служу вам и не желаю другой судьбы".

We can hardly be in the same room, so jumped at the opportunity to became your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious sibling for nudging me toward the best decision of my life, I serve you with all my heart and wish no other fate."

We can hardly be in the same room, so jumped at the opportunity to became your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious sibling for nudging me toward the best decision of my life, I serve you with all my heart and wish no other fate."

We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."

languages.text: « Si je suis ici, c'est à cause de mon cousin, Macharius, {n}répond-elle avec une lueur furieuse dans le regard.{/n} Il m'est insupportable, et c'est réciproque. Rester dans la même pièce était pour nous une torture, alors quand j'ai eu l'occasion de devenir votre prévôt, je l'ai saisie. Tout odieux qu'il soit, je devrais le remercier de m'avoir poussée à prendre la meilleure décision de ma vie. Je vous sers de tout mon cœur, et nul autre destin ne m'est plus enviable que celui-ci. »
languages.original_text: "Because of my cousin Macharius." {n}A furious crease appears between her brows.{/n} "I cannot stand him, but the feeling is mutual. We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."

traits.locale_text: « Si je suis ici, c'est à cause de mon frère, Macharius, {n}répond-elle avec une lueur furieuse dans le regard.{/n} Il m'est insupportable, et c'est réciproque. Rester dans la même pièce était pour nous une torture, alors quand j'ai eu l'occasion de devenir votre prévôt, je l'ai saisie. Tout odieux qu'il soit, je devrais le remercier de m'avoir poussée à prendre la meilleure décision de ma vie. Je vous sers de tout mon cœur, et nul autre destin m'est plus enviable que celui-ci. »

languages.text: «Por mi primo Macharius». {n}Su ceño se frunce con furia.{/n} «No le aguanto, pero el sentimiento es mutuo. Apenas podemos tolerar estar en la misma sala, de modo que acepté de inmediato la oportunidad de convertirme en guardia para usted. Debería agradecerle a mi irritante primo el haberme empujado a la mejor decisión de mi vida. L{mf|e|a} sirvo con todo mi corazón y no deseo un destino que no sea este».
languages.original_text: "Because of my cousin Macharius." {n}A furious crease appears between her brows.{/n} "I cannot stand him, but the feeling is mutual. We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."

traits.locale_text: «Por mi hermano Macharius». {n}Su ceño se frunce con furia.{/n} «No le aguanto, pero el sentimiento es mutuo. Apenas podemos tolerar estar en la misma sala, de modo que acepté de inmediato la oportunidad de convertirme en agente de seguridad para usted. Debería agradecerle a mi irritante hermano el haberme empujado a la mejor decisión de mi vida. L{mf|e|a} sirvo con todo mi corazón y no deseo un destino que no sea este».

languages.text: “因为我表哥马卡里乌斯。”{n}她的眉毛之间浮现出了愤怒的皱纹。{/n}“我受不了这个人，他也一样受不了我，我们甚至没办法呆在同一个房间里。于是，当我有机会成为您的执法者时，我欣然把握住了这个机会。幸亏有了这个该死的表哥，我才能做出这个人生中最美妙的决定。我渴望全心全意为您服务，大人。除此之外，我不再有任何奢望。”
languages.original_text: "Because of my cousin Macharius." {n}A furious crease appears between her brows.{/n} "I cannot stand him, but the feeling is mutual. We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."

traits.locale_text: “因为我哥哥马卡里乌斯。”{n}她的眉毛之间浮现出了愤怒的皱纹。{/n}“我受不了这个人，他也同样受不了我，我们甚至没办法呆在同一个房间里。于是，当我有机会成为您的镇压者时，我欣然把握住了这个机会。幸亏有了这个该死的哥哥，我才能做出这个人生中最美妙的决定。我渴望全心全意为您服务，大人。除此之外，我不再有任何奢望。”

languages.text: 「私のいとこ、マカリウスのお陰です」{n}彼女は眉間に怒りを込めたしわを寄せた。{/n}「彼の事は許せない。けど、これはお互い様です。同じ部屋で時を過ごす事さえできない。だから、あなたのエンフォーサーになるチャンスが与えられたとき、掴んだのです。この人生で一番の選択をしたことは、いとこに感謝するべきですね。心からあなたに尽くします。もう、他の運命など求めません」
languages.original_text: "Because of my cousin Macharius." {n}A furious crease appears between her brows.{/n} "I cannot stand him, but the feeling is mutual. We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."

traits.locale_text: 「私の兄弟、マカリウスのお陰です」{n}彼女は眉間に怒りを込めたしわを寄せた。{/n}「彼の事は許せない。けど、これはお互い様です。同じ部屋で時を過ごす事さえできない。だから、あなたのエンフォーサーになるチャンスが与えられたとき、掴んだのです。この人生で一番の選択をしたことは、兄弟に感謝するべきですね。心からあなたに尽くします。もう、他の運命など求めません」

languages.text: "Wegen meines Cousins Macharius." {n}Zornige Falten erscheinen zwischen ihren Brauen.{/n} "Ich kann ihn nicht ausstehen, doch das beruht auf Gegenseitigkeit. Wir halten es kaum im selben Raum miteinander aus, daher habe ich sofort zugesagt, als sich die Gelegenheit ergeben hat, Euer Enforcer zu werden. Ich sollte meinem nervigen Cousin danken, dass er mich zur besten Entscheidung meines Lebens genötigt hat. Ich diene Euch mit ganzem Herzen und würde mir kein anderes Schicksal wünschen als dieses."
languages.original_text: "Because of my cousin Macharius." {n}A furious crease appears between her brows.{/n} "I cannot stand him, but the feeling is mutual. We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."

traits.locale_text: "Wegen meines Bruders Macharius." {n}Zornige Falten erscheinen zwischen ihren Brauen.{/n} "Ich kann ihn nicht ausstehen, doch das beruht auf Gegenseitigkeit. Wir halten es kaum im selben Raum miteinander aus, daher habe ich sofort zugesagt, als sich die Gelegenheit ergeben hat, Euer Enforcer zu werden. Ich sollte meinem nervtötenden Bruder danken, dass er mich zur besten Entscheidung meines Lebens genötigt hat. Ich diene Euch mit ganzem Herzen und würde mir kein anderes Schicksal wünschen als dieses."

languages.text: "Kuzenim Macharius nedeniyle." {n}Kaşlarının arasında öfkeli bir buruşukluk peyda oluyor.{/n} "Ona katlanamam ama bu duygularım karşılıklı. Birbirimizle aynı odada bile bulunamayız, o yüzden infazcınız olma fırsatına hemen atladım. Beni hayatımda verdiğim en iyi kararı vermeye ittiği için iğrenç kuzenime teşekkür etmeliyim. Size tüm kalbimle hizmet ediyorum ve kaderimde başka bir şey olsun istemezdim."
languages.original_text: "Because of my cousin Macharius." {n}A furious crease appears between her brows.{/n} "I cannot stand him, but the feeling is mutual. We can hardly be in the same room together, so I jumped at the opportunity to become your enforcer. I should thank my obnoxious cousin for nudging me toward the best decision of my life. I serve you with all my heart and wish for no other fate than this one."
